Message.Title: Like or hate Syb, Syb calls it as Syb sees it
Message.Msg: May or may not be correct about this blowoff (a good case can be made that its already happened), but the possibility exists of a "new era" top ;like 1929, 1987 and 1999. That is the small picture. The big picture is the Grand Canyon once the top is here. A mere quibble whether the top is now or a month from now.

Topic.Title: Like or hate Syb, Syb calls it as Syb sees it

Message.Msg: Ever climbed Mt. Whitney? The end of the trail near the top gets steeper and steeper, until you turn the corner and your there, at the top. You look down 10,000 feet, almost two miles, into the Owens Valley right below your feet. The market is going into the Owens Valley. The only question is are we quite at the summit yet, or a hundred feet shy. Mere hair splitting.

Topic.Title: Tail, if bit coin stok markets were to go down, and never to rise again then and only then would wealth be destroyed, in the meantime....

Message.Msg: Scamazon's meteoric rise over the last few years is due to QE. Earnings don't matter because there is a steady stream of money coming in next month to pump up the Fat Pig. If you believe in QE Forever, then cover your short positions and move on. But if you believe that QE is about to end in the next few months, then hang tight with your short positions by selling your winners so you can ride out the storm. There will be a repeat of 1999 when Scamazon's stock price was cut by 90%. I always keep 2x cash for each share short to avoid forced liquidation. Remember that big $ is made by doing the unexpected. When people pile into housing...time to get out. When people buy Scamazon because it will never go down...time to short. Not many can short at the top, but at current valuation, all will make at least $200 on the downside. The crooks tout AWS as the great $ maker, but one only need to look at the other big competitors like IBM to see the true earning potential. Intense competition between the big dogs will keep margins at low level, forever. In summary, Scamazon is a giant bubble fueled by QE. Once there is confirmation of the end of QE, the rats will jump ship...fast because no one wants to be the last to sell a bubble stock. The smart funds will probably anticipate the end of QE by a quarter or two by scaling back this Pig. The best time to short a bubble stock is when there is so much uncertainty about going shot because the tape is showing that the longs are in total control.

Topic.Title: tech, so can u do some two dimensional thing

Message.Msg: Cash, yes the entire QE/money printing thing is about providing the appearance of stability while imposing negative real returns to deflate the system (while allowing the banks to use their information advantage slowly unload more toxic assets to the taxpayers/Fed and, these days, retail investing public via passive ETFs...). To your point, all sell side scamalysts call the market cheap with hopeful hockeystick projections for FY2014 (and beyond), yet measured by TTM (actuals), the market is anything but cheap. IMHO, the paper/physical gold disconnect will catalyze the black swan (unless something else wins the race). Flows must balance eventually, else any stock, no matter how large, will be depleted. For the past few years, we have witnessed accelerating imbalances in flows, which in turn only accelerates the required changes to establish a new stable equilibrium. Companies oriented toward domestic consumption are in trouble. Those highly levered (financially or operationally) to domestic consumption are headed for a collapse. We'll see...
